name: docindexer
description: Process files to prepare them for vectorization and indexing

commonOptions.name: source_folder
commonOptions.description: Path to the folder containing files to be processed

commonOptions.name: catalogue
commonOptions.description: Path to a catalogue JSON file

commonOptions.name: file_name
commonOptions.description: the name of the file to be processed

commonOptions.name: limit
commonOptions.description: Limit the number of files to be processed

commonOptions.name: output_folder
commonOptions.description: Path to the folder where processed files should be saved

commonOptions.name: create_local_config
commonOptions.description: Create a local config.json file with current settings

commonOptions.name: create_global_config
commonOptions.description: Create a global config.json file with current settings

commonOptions.name: run_after_config_create
commonOptions.description: Run the command after creating config file(s)

commonOptions.name: debug
commonOptions.description: Enable debug mode with additional logging

commonOptions.name: dry_run
commonOptions.description: Perform a dry run without saving any files

commonOptions.name: include_hidden
commonOptions.description: Include hidden files and directories (starting with .)

commands.name: list
commands.description: List files that would be processed based on configuration

options.name: pattern
options.description: Pattern to match file names (glob pattern by default)

options.name: use_regex
options.description: Use regular expressions instead of glob patterns

options.name: sort_by
options.description: Sort files by: name, date, or size

options.name: max_depth
options.description: Maximum directory depth for recursive search

commands.name: index
commands.description: Index documents in the specified path

options.name: output
options.description: Output file path for the index

commands.name: structure
commands.description: Create a hierarchical JSON representation of markdown structure

options.name: ommit_properties
options.description: Comma-separated list of properties to omit from the JSON output (e.g., 'items,size')

configurationSources.name: Command-line arguments
configurationSources.description: Options specified directly on the command line

configurationSources.name: Local config file
configurationSources.description: JSON configuration file in the current directory

configurationSources.name: Global config file
configurationSources.description: JSON configuration file in the user's home directory
